thread.title: Men Reveal the One Thing They Would Do It If Wasn’t Considered Feminine
thread.title_full: Men Reveal the One Thing They Would Do It If Wasn’t Considered Feminine

author: Barry K
title: Men Reveal the One Thing They Would Do It If Wasn’t Considered Feminine
text:
Your Privacy Rights Canadian Customers 
You’re a free man, and you can do whatever the hell you want. Alas, plenty of social norms still exist in 2017, which is why you don’t see a ton of dudes wearing mascara or sporting stilettos at work (except for the one time this Men’s Health writer wore high heels to the office ). But what if we lived in a judgment-free world, and no one blinked if you publicly indulged your inner woman? 
That’s the basis for one of our favorite Reddit threads yet. When one user recently posed the question, “ What thing would you do if it wasn’t so ‘feminine’ or socially ‘unacceptable’? ” thousands of men on Reddit chimed in with some truly inspired responses. The most popular comment—“If I didn’t have a penis, I would only wear yoga pants”—is probably the best, because yoga pants are comfortable as hell and make your ass look awesome. But browse through the thread and you’ll find some equally great answers. Advertisement
